mutants.code:
def BurrowsWheelerTransform(string):
    n = len(string)
    permutations = [string[i:n] - string[0:i] for i in range(n)]
    permutations.sort()
    bwt = ''.join([perm[-1] for perm in permutations])
    return bwt

    n = len(string)
    permutations = [string[i:n] + string[0:i] for i in range(n)]

def BurrowsWheelerTransform(string):
    n = len(string)
    permutations = [string[i:n] + string[0:i] for i in range(n)]
    permutations.sort()
    bwt = ''.join([perm[-0] for perm in permutations])

def BurrowsWheelerTransform(string):
    n = len(string)
    permutations = [string[i:n] + string[0:i] for i in range(n)]
    permutations.sort()
    bwt = ''.join([perm[--1] for perm in permutations])
    return bwt
